channel.title: RuneScape Clan
channel.description:
I've been bored on RuneScape lately and just came up with the best idea today. I would like to create a new clan and get a group of people (all with microphones - no exception) and chat while we play via Skype. Of course we won't just create this clan for the chatting, but we will hold events as much as possible. There are a few things you should understand before you consider joining:
[ul][li]Voice level - I love having a great time, but please, do not scream.[/li] [li]Cooperation - This may sound dumb, but in order for us to keep 'cool', we will have to work with each other and get along.[/li] [li]Harassment - No matter the cause, do not bully anyone in any form. This includes making fun of someone's voice, origin, or even race.[/li][/ul] If you can keep those three things under control I believe we can build a successful clan. If you are interested in joining, feel free to reply to this topic or contact me via the ways below.
[b]Contact Details:[/b] Skype: float4life RS: Airlocks
Thanks, hope to meet cool people.
[b]Edit: [/b]If you have nothing nice to say, simply don't say it.

item.title: RuneScape Clan
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:6, topic:442914”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=545604.msg3999280#msg3999280 date=1337726895]
There’s pretty much 2 main kinds of people who play RS

  1. Younger kids who think the word penis is funny
  2. Teens who do absolutely nothing in school and act like they do drugs when they’re only 16 and make fun of people’s extremely minor flaws because they think they’re better.
    [/quote]
    That’s a dumb statement.[/quote]

Anyways OT: Can’t see this working out… gl though

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Clan
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:8, topic:442914”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=545604.msg3999291#msg3999291 date=1337727779]

There’s pretty much 2 main kinds of people who play RS

  1. Younger kids who think the word penis is funny
  2. Teens who do absolutely nothing in school and act like they do drugs when they’re only 16 and make fun of people’s extremely minor flaws because they think they’re better.

That’s a dumb statement.
[/quote]
Honestly he’s right, I see that allot within the community.
Everyone’s always talking about smoking weed like there wiz khalifa and anytime I log on runescape I can’t logg off without seeing the word penis.[/quote]
While it may happen within the community it still doesn’t justify Javas statement of saying that there are mainly 2 types of players bother being of a low maturity level when its really not the truth.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Clan
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I’ve been bored on RuneScape lately and just came up with the best idea today. I would like to create a new clan and get a group of people (all with microphones - no exception) and chat while we play via Skype. Of course we won’t just create this clan for the chatting, but we will hold events as much as possible. There are a few things you should understand before you consider joining:

[ul][li]Voice level - I love having a great time, but please, do not scream.[/li]
[li]Cooperation - This may sound dumb, but in order for us to keep ‘cool’, we will have to work with each other and get along.[/li]
[li]Harassment - No matter the cause, do not bully anyone in any form. This includes making fun of someone’s voice, origin, or even race.[/li][/ul]
If you can keep those three things under control I believe we can build a successful clan. If you are interested in joining, feel free to reply to this topic or contact me via the ways below.

Contact Details:
Skype: float4life
RS: Airlocks

Thanks, hope to meet cool people.

Edit: If you have nothing nice to say, simply don’t say it.
